word_mean: 质体：基本结构单位，如细胞
含色素(如叶绿素和胡萝卜素类)的或能合成和贮存物质(如淀粉)的植物的任何特殊细胞器
这些细胞器包括叶绿粒和淀粉成形体

sentence.Network_en: Effects of different sun - shading treatments plastid pigment on flue - cured tobacco were researched.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了不同遮阳处理对不同生育期及不同部位烟叶叶绿素及类胡萝卜素的含量影响.

sentence.Network_en: Amyloplast A plastid that synthesizes and stores starch grains.
sentence.Network_cn: 淀粉体:一种与合成和储存淀粉粒有关的质体.

sentence.Network_en: Proteoplast A colorless plastid ( leucoplast ) that stores protein.
sentence.Network_cn: 类蛋白体:指储存蛋白质的无色质体 ( 白色体 ).

PerfectNetExp.abs: 质体(plastid)是植物细胞中由双层膜包裹的一类细胞器的总称，存在于真核植物细胞内。它是绿色植物细胞特有的细胞器，是动植物细 …

list.abs: deposition of starch in plastids initiates at this stage . part of plastids vacuolated with invagination of plastid membrane , which possess the same function as that of vacuole in the cell .质体开始积累淀粉，部分质体呈空泡状，并出现质体膜内陷，这与液泡具相似的功能。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from German, based on Greek plastos 'shaped'

means.word_mean: 1. any of various small particles in the cytoplasm of the cells of plants and some animals containing pigments or starch or oil or protein
